API¶

tglc

tglc.quick_lc.tglc_lc(target='NGC 7654', local_directory='', size=90)¶

Generate light curve for a single target.

Parameters:

  • target (str, required) – target identifier

  • local_directory (str, required) – output directory

  • size (int, optional) – size of the FFI cut, default size is 90. Recommend large number for better quality. Cannot exceed 100.

TESS Gaia Light Curve
